name: Snakeformer
description:
This is an experiment kindled by the weekly game jams' topic of "single-player co-op" for week 136.In it you play as both the platformer character and the snake,which is the only platform.

The game currently only has a survival mode,where you need to be constantly collecting pellets to prevent death by constantly decreasing health.Will maybe add online capabilities and a level-based puzzle mode if there's enough interest.

Credits:

UI Key graphics - Kenney 1-bit pack
Audio SFX - LMMS ,sfxr and my non-existent sound design skills.
